creditline: The Alfred and Ingrid Lenz Harrison Fund
description: little boy at bottom center lying on a concrete step crying; little girl at left running out of picture plane with head raised and mouth open; mounted to stiff cardboard and matted under mylar
image_copyright: © Dave Heath%2C Courtesy Howard Greenberg Gallery%2C NYC
markings: \'P.296\', in blue pencil, upper left corner on mount verso; \'print must be returned [underlined in purple] to ->\', in black marker, at top edge of mount verso; \'DAVE HEATH\', stamp, upper right corner on mount verso; \'c/o Reyerson Polytechnical Inst./Dept. Photographic Arts/50 Gould Street/ Toronto Ontario Canada\', in blue ink to right of stamp on mount verso; \'71 [circled]\', in pencil, upper right corner of sheet; \'REPRODUCTION PRINT\', stamp, on mount near upper left corner of sheet verso; \'Angle light to/avoid picking/up scratches/and ripples\', in blue ink, below lower left corner of sheet on mount verso; \'E-35 1/2\', in red marker, to right of previous inscription on mount verso; \'Hold shot/and subtle grey 296 [in black] tones.\', in blue ink, to right of previous inscription on mount verso; \'Tradition and Dissent #95912 [crossed out]\', in black ink, below previous inscription, on mount verso; printed label, in red with blue ink notations, left of center on mount recto; \'\'Vengeful Sister\'/Chicago 1956/Dave Heath\', in pencil, below label recto; \'DAVE HEATH [2 other lines covered by label]\', stamp, vertically at center on mount recto; \'403 N 20th/Phila Pa 19130 [crossed out]\', in red ink, on label partially covering stamp, on mount recto; \'c/o Ryerson Photo Arts/122 Bond Street/Toronto Ontario Canada\', in purple marker, vertically below stamp at center of mount recto; \'#26\', in red pencil, near upper right corner at top edge on mount recto; \'Place credit running vertically from bottom/to top of photo-7/8\' from bottom trim edge ü 3/8\' from right trim edge.\', in blue ink, on paper taped to right edge of mount recto; \'Photo by Dave Heath |<->| 5/16\' [in blue ink] for use with Perceptions in Literature, copyright (C) 1972 by Houghton Mifflin Company.\', printed in black, on sheet taped to paper at right edge of mount recto
title: Vengeful Sister, Chicago
